item.title: 14 Nov 2025 10:30
item.description:
Stopped by the Campost office earlier this Monday and bought a good ton of stamps. Added them to my digital stamp collection. The Post office received a fresh coat of paint last month for the Presidential election. Staff were super welcoming and were super curious as to why we were purchasing that many stamps.

There’s barely anybody I know that collects stamps still. Someday maybe I’ll mail these out to someone who’s genuinely interested. ðŸ”—

item.title: 26 Oct 2025 10:30
item.description:
Immich is pretty neat! It does hog /need a decent machine to run though. I briefly dabbled installing it on an RPi3 a year ago and figured the juice wasn’t worth the squeeze for what I was looking at. I’m pretty content with having all my media on a Nextcloud server where rest of my files reside. This seven year old repurposed laptop on which NC runs In tandem with Tailscale and a digital frame, serves most of my needs for now.

Also love that subtle clink you have going on in the comment form! Pretty crafty! ðŸ”—

item.title: 25 Oct 2025 10:30
item.description: TIL certain watches ‘skip seconds’ to conserve battery and to indicate that they are almost out of charge. Noticed this in my Fossil watch a few weeks ago and didn’t bother finding out why. Today, it went dead and only then did I connect the dots! Super neat! Skip a second, warn but still keep time. This is similar to a vehicle’s indicator light flashing quicker when the bulb’s blown. ðŸ”—
